argument.name: path
argument.description: A path or array of paths to update. The path is a string with "." representing object sub-properties. For example if the data had an object with the name "customer", and the value of the "id" property of the object was to be changed, the path would be "customer.id".

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value(s) to put in the corresponding path(s).

argument.name: fireEvent
argument.description: Whether or not to fire the onChange event after the update.

page.description: Update values in the data. A single path and value may be passed in, or an array of paths and values.
